Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Player

  • public class Player
extends Entity
    Class Player creates a player with a Point position, integer health, and booleans for having a map and a key. A player also has integer attackStrength for fighting monsters in the maze and a random number generator to give random attack hit points to monsters hero is the Player object in the game MazeGame and MazeGameGUI.

    Since:
    July 20, 2019

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      Default constructor sets the position to Point (0,0), health to 35, attackStrength to 7 and hasKey and hasMap booleans to false
      Player(Player p)
      Copy constructor copies the location health and attackStrength from another player object into the new object being constructed.
      Player(Point p, int heal, int strength)
      Input constructor sets the location by x,y coordinate pair input and initial health to heal, and attackStrength to strength.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addHealth(int amount)
      Mutator to increase the health of a player by a positive amount.
      void deathMessage()
      Displays custom Player death message (Polymorphic call).
      void die()
      Mutator sets Player health to zero, removes items Key and Map, and outputs a death message.
      void displayStats()
      Accessor displays Player Statistics in a decorative manner.
      boolean getHasMap()
      Accessor to get the boolean value of hasMap
      void setHasMap(boolean val)
      Mutator to set the status of whether the player has the map.

      • Methods inherited from class Entity

        attacks, getAttackStrength, getHasKey, getHealth, getPosition, isAlive, moveDown, moveLeft, moveRight, moveUp, setAttackStrength, setHasKey, setHealth, setPosition, setPosition, takesDamage

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player()
        Default constructor sets the position to Point (0,0), health to 35, attackStrength to 7 and hasKey and hasMap booleans to false

      • Player

        public Player(Point p,
              int heal,
              int strength)
        Input constructor sets the location by x,y coordinate pair input and initial health to heal, and attackStrength to strength.
        Parameters:
        p - A Point where the player is located on initialization.
        heal - an integer to set the initial health level of the player.
        strength - an integer to set the attack strength of the player

      • Player

        public Player(Player p)
        Copy constructor copies the location health and attackStrength from another player object into the new object being constructed.
        Parameters:
        p - A Player object to be copy constructed.

    • Method Detail

      • getHasMap

        public boolean getHasMap()
        Accessor to get the boolean value of hasMap
        Returns:
        a boolean representing the state of hasMap, true if player has the map.

      • addHealth

        public void addHealth(int amount)
        Mutator to increase the health of a player by a positive amount. Does nothing if input amount is negative.
        Parameters:
        amount - a positive integer amount to increase player health by.

      • setHasMap

        public void setHasMap(boolean val)
        Mutator to set the status of whether the player has the map.
        Parameters:
        val - a boolean to set the status of hasMap, input true if player has the map, false to set that they don't have the map.

      • die

        public void die()
        Mutator sets Player health to zero, removes items Key and Map, and outputs a death message.
        Overrides:
        die in class Entity

      • displayStats

        public void displayStats()
        Accessor displays Player Statistics in a decorative manner. (Polymorphic Call)
        Specified by:
        displayStats in class Entity

      • deathMessage

        public void deathMessage()
        Displays custom Player death message (Polymorphic call).
        Specified by:
        deathMessage in class Entity
